text:
New developments in the treatment of bipolar disorder with psychotic

symptoms include the use of novel antipsychotics and mood stabilizers.

A study published in the Journal of Clinical Psychopharmacology found that

aripiprazole, a novel antipsychotic, was effective in reducing symptoms of

mania in patients with bipolar I disorder. (url website)

Differences from Existing Content

While the previous section discussed treatment options for bipolar disorder
